name: IsoSpirits
description:
Inspired by feudal East-Asia,  IsoSpirits is a challenging  isometric strategy game in which you control up to four units to fight the spirit-enemies. Each unit has its own class and different skills to choose from.  Think about your moves to best counter the enemy!

Created by:

Simon Herfert ( https://twitter.com/SimonHerfert ) - Programming & Design

Janna Zimmer ( https://twitter.com/jannzim )- Art, Animation & Design
